Brian, I do not see this in DTP 0.7 RC0 (20060309) build. Please confirm. If you can not repro, let's change resolutions to "worksforme" and ask the reporter for more environment details.
This might also be related to the fix that Larry added yesterday (3/8). Please double check and confirm.

(In reply to comment #2)
> DTP 0.7 RC0 (20060309) 

How many RC0 builds are there? 

The latest I could find on the website is 20060308 or 20060803 (how do you write the dates?).

BTW, I'm running on Eclipse 3.1.2 with Webtools 1.0.1 and the compatibility pack.

Found the issue to be with how the action provider was being initialized. That has been fixed and should appear in tonight's nightly build. BTW... Our dates are US-style -- year/month/day or month/day/year
